LanguageData.AllowNonSmeltableWeapons.description: Allow weapons which can't be smelted.
LanguageData.AllowPlantFood.label: allow plant food
LanguageData.AllowPlantFood.description: Allow foods that are of quality equivalent to unharvested plants, like hay.
